knowledge_documents.title: Product Knowledge Base
knowledge_documents.content:
# TechSpace Coworking

TechSpace is a modern coworking space designed for tech professionals, startups, and remote workers.

## Location
- Downtown area with easy access to public transport
- Near restaurants, cafes, and shops
- Secure building with 24/7 access

## Amenities
- Ultra-fast gigabit internet (fiber optic)
- Ergonomic Herman Miller chairs
- Standing desks available
- Phone booths for private calls
- Zoom rooms for video conferences
- Kitchen with espresso machine
- Lounge area with games
- Weekly community events
- Rooftop terrace

## Typical Members
- Software developers
- Digital marketers
- Designers and creatives
- Startup founders
- Remote workers
- Freelancers

## Why Choose TechSpace?
1. Tech-focused community
2. High-speed infrastructure
3. Flexible membership options
4. Prime location
5. Active community events

knowledge_documents.title: Common Objections
knowledge_documents.content:
# Handling Common Objections

## "It's too expensive"
- Compare to cost of coffee shops + home office setup
- Emphasize productivity gains and networking value
- Mention day pass option to try first
- Flexible contracts (month-to-month)

## "I work from home just fine"
- Discuss separation of work/life balance
- Professional meeting space for clients
- Networking opportunities
- Improved focus and productivity
- Community and social interaction

## "I don't need a full-time space"
- Day pass and hot desk options
- Flexible scheduling
- Only pay for what you use

## "What if I need to cancel?"
- Month-to-month contracts
- No long-term commitments
- Easy cancellation process
- Can downgrade plans anytime
